name: Intro
journal: I can remember what I can do by typing 'help commands'. I need to use 'map' to see where I am.

params: I should familiarize myself with some basic commands. I'll start by typing 'map' to see where I am.

name: Intro Map
journal: I used the map to see where I am. Now I should use the look command.

params: Now that I've found where I am, I should use the 'look' command to see what surrounds me.

name: Complete
journal: I now have a basic knowledge of how I can explore this world.

params: Now that I've completed these tasks I feel ready to explore the world.
